CUSTOMER 360 GUIDE FOR RETAIL
Engage Shoppers on Every Channel

Unify your marketing and commerce to better adapt to customer preferences and provide relevant, behavior-based intelligent communications that engage customers and drive sales.

Shoppers have high expectations when they engage with brands and purchase products. They expect to receive personalized, relevant communications whether they’re in a store, on the web, or on social media. Turning this vision into reality requires building solutions that connect people across your business and products from different technology areas.

Recommended Products

These products can help you engage shoppers on every channel.

Marketing Cloud
B2C Commerce

Get quick time to value by selecting Salesforce recommended solutions that you can implement immediately, while putting together a roadmap to build out more mature capabilities over time. Business Capabilities

Your organization’s implementation of a capability can range from undeveloped to industry-leading. For each capability, we list best practices that you can use to grow your maturity and provide information on solution implementation.

Marketing Capabilities to Engage Shoppers on Every Channel
Market and engage with customers across your business using their preferred channels.
Service Capabilities to Engage Shoppers on Every Channel
Provide service to customers on the channels they prefer.
Commerce Capabilities to Engage Shoppers on Every Channel
Drive customers to your ecommerce site with campaign planning, recommendations, search engine optimization, and customer segmentation.
